name: Ballbooster
overview: Ballbooster is a shared-screen action/reflex video game for Commodore 64, created and published by Markt & Technik in 1988, it was published in both 64'er Sonderheft 30 and in 64'er Sonderheft 37. It is an action sports game for two opponents. A rousing mix of galactic sports game and real simulation: Ballbooster - great fun for two. With constantly new tactics and a lot of skill you outwit your fellow players.
